welcome_message_body: Welcome to Coon Rapids, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant community, and welcoming atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anoka County–Blaine Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Anoka County–Blaine Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Crystal Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Crystal Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Flying Cloud Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Princeton Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Princeton Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
